Sentencas: The perovskite LaNi0.6Fe0.4O3 has been prepared by the glycine-nitrate route using different amounts of glycine/fuel ratio (GIN = 0.5, 1.0 and 1.5), in order to study the sample preparation influence on the properties in the context of their application as a cathode contact material for solid oxide fuel cells (SOFCs).
Titulo: Characterization of LaNi0.6Fe0.4O3 perovskite synthesized by glycine-nitrate combustion method

Sentencas: The obtained materials have been characterized by X-ray diffraction, scanning electron microscopy, dilatometry and electrical conductivity measurements.
Titulo: Characterization of LaNi0.6Fe0.4O3 perovskite synthesized by glycine-nitrate combustion method

Sentencas: All the compounds have rhombohedral symmetry and a porous microstructure with fine grain sizes.
Titulo: Characterization of LaNi0.6Fe0.4O3 perovskite synthesized by glycine-nitrate combustion method

Sentencas: The sample obtained at the G/N of 1.0 has more suitable conductivity values for application as SOFC contact material.
Titulo: Characterization of LaNi0.6Fe0.4O3 perovskite synthesized by glycine-nitrate combustion method
Characterization of LaNi0.6Fe0.4O3 perovskite synthesized by glycine-nitrate combustion method
